actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-668.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 282 - 47 (Record Vote No: 100).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5172) to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal years 1984 and 1985 and for related purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5172 (National Bureau of Standards funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5172) to authorize appropriations to the Secretary of Commerce for the programs of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal years 1984 and 1985 and for related purposes.
